divs: Sighting Details First abscence of normal sounds. Took break fromwork to sit on porch. Observed many Very high speed objects from E to W. 3 to 5times faster than a satellite. Next, suspicious recon plane same path e to w.Then many erratic moving objects overhead. followed by many birds and varietysat high altitude. Then normal air traffic resumed. (Live near airport)
